page.title: 19FROYLE POSTMASTER'S DAY
page.content:
My first job of the day is to {deliver {milk}to Yarnhams cottages. Once this is done the next job is to check off the morning deliveries.
After this all working surfaces are cleaned.
The next job is ordering the day's{ {vegetables. }This is done with an amount of guesswork considering items such as lettuce will only sell whilst weather is warm.
Serving customers and Post Office form filling fills the rest of the day. The{Post Office}work accounts for abput half of my time in the shop. At the end of the day I cash up the tills and finish the bookwork. Lastly I visit the cash and carry and purchase the stock required for the next week.
